title: Project Aurora
description: This princess loves to play and sleep whenever her owner is, choose her if you prefer very close and lovely company.

title: DataViz Dash
description: This strong boy makes you feel safe, he will always take care of you and keep your hearth and felings safe.

title: Lazy Tony
description: If you are more of a quiet lazy weekend, Tony is the perfect company for the those days you dont want to see people
